DOC.brief_summary: Comparision of two different cannulation techniques on the neurological outcome in cardiac surcical procedures. Study hypothesis: Cannulation of the axilaris artery can reduce neurolocical side effects.
DOC.brief_title: Cannulation of the Artery Axiliaris for Extracorporeal Circulation
DOC.criteria: Cardiac procedure with ecc Age 4085 years CABG and/or valve Stenosis of a.subclavia
